songs.title: Stardust
songs.lyrics:
Sometimes I wonder why I spend
my lonely night dreaming of a song
The melody haunts my reverie
And I am once again with you
All the love that's new
And each kiss and inspiration
But that was long ago and
Now my consolation
Is in the stardust of a song

Beside a garden wall
Where stars are bright
And You are in my arms
The nightingales tells a fairy tale
A paradise where roses bloom
Though I dream in vain
In my heart of will remain
My stardust melody
The memory of love's refrain
